heading: Welcome {{givenName}} {{familyName}}
content: Here is your personal edulution.io dashboard. The place where all your digital education operation applications are gathered.

mobileAccess.title: Mobile File Access
mobileAccess.content: You can access the school server from many mobile devices. Click on Manual to start.
mobileAccess.scanAccessInfo: To transfer the access data, please scan the following QR code with the edulution.io app.
mobileAccess.scanAppStoreLink: Scan the QR code with your mobile device to download the edultion-io app from the AppStore.
mobileAccess.nextStepPreview: In the next step you can transfer the access data.

errors.SessionExpiring: You will be logged off in less than a minute.

errors.ToggleSchoolClassJoinedFailed: Failed to join or leave the classroom
errors.ToggleProjectJoinedFailed: Failed to join or leave the project
errors.TogglePrinterJoinedFailed: Failed to add or remove the printer

importer.title: Email Importer
importer.noMailConfigured: Mail app is not active. Please contact your system administrator.

errors.MeetingNotFound: A meeting with this ID was not found

errors.AlreadyInAnotherMeeting: You are already in a conference. Please leave the current conference before joining another one.

classmanagement.title: CLASS ROOM
classmanagement.name: Name
classmanagement.notMemberOfClass: You are no member of a class.
classmanagement.typeToSearchUsersGroupsProjects: Type to add students, classes or projects
classmanagement.typeToSearchUsersGroupsProjectsToNewSess: Type to add students, classes or projects to a new session
classmanagement.itsNotPossibleToEditOtherTeacher: At the moment it is not possible to create the directory for sharing in another teacher's home directory or to manage the administration groups.
classmanagement.itsNotPossibleToEditOtherSchoolStudents: At the moment it is not possible to create the directory for sharing in a student's home directory of another school or to manage the administration groups.
classmanagement.noStudentsForAction: There are no students to whom this action can be applied.
classmanagement.printPasswordsPageDescription: Create files to print the passwords of individual classes or select classes to print several at the same time.
classmanagement.passwordRequirements: Use upper case letters, lower case letters and special characters or numbers.
classmanagement.projectsPageDescription: Here you will find an overview of all projects in which you are an admin.
classmanagement.featureIsStillInDevelopment: The feature is still under development and will be implemented in the next version.
classmanagement.CollectFilesDescription: Here you will collect all files.
classmanagement.exammodeDescription: Toggle the exam mode for {{count}} students
classmanagement.showcollectedfilesDescription: Show the collected files of {{count}} students
classmanagement.pdfDescription: Create a PDF file to print the passwords for these school classes
classmanagement.csvDescription: Create a CSV file to print the passwords for these school classes
classmanagement.enrolPageDescription: Select the classes and projects that you want to enrol yourself by checking the checkboxes.

description.bulletinboard: Configure the user groups that have access to the Blackboard Editor app here. The categories can be used to control for which users and groups the notice board with the messages is displayed instead of the classic dashboard.
